text: Anthony Nelson (born 31 July 1997) is a Caymanian football player who plays as a midfielder for Welsh club Llanelli Town and the Cayman Islands national team. ==International career== He made his debut for the Cayman Islands national football team on 22 March 2019 in a CONCACAF Nations League qualifier against Montserrat, as a 79th-minute substitute for Andrés Ruiz. He made two subsequent appearances against Cuba, starting on one occasion. ==Career statistics== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- !
